title: Safe
description: Unlikely allies Joe Miller and the crew of the Rocinante led by Jim Holden uncover more about the conspiracy to release the protomolecule on Eros station.

title: Doors & Corners
description: Holden  and crew stage a dangerous raid in search of information about the protomolecule.

title: Static
description: Holden and Miller butt heads about how the raid was handled.

title: Godspeed
description: Miller devises a dangerous plan to eradicate what's left of the protomolecule on Eros.

title: Home
description: The Rocinante chases an asteroid as it hurtles toward Earth.

title: Paradigm Shift
description: Earth and Mars search for answers in the aftermath of the asteroid collision.

title: The Seventh Man
description: Preparations for the Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Errinwright.

title: Pyre
description: Naomi tracks down signs of the protomolecule; Fred Johnson's control over the OPA collapses.

title: The Weeping Somnambulist
description: Bobbie becomes a political pawn in the struggle between Earth and Mars.

title: Cascade
description: Holden leads his crew through the war-torn station on Ganymede.

title: Here There Be Dragons
description: Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.

title: The Monster and the Rocket
description: A discovery pushes Naomi and Holden apart and sets the Roci crew against each other.

title: Caliban's War
description: The crew deal with the aftermath of the Ganymede Incident.
